page.title: 18RECREATION 2 - ACTIVITIES.
page.content: {GENERAL.}Our survey showed that approx 46% took part in sporting activities; 22% enjoyed gardening; 15% reading; 8% music; 2% photography; 7% various. 40% used the Community Centre on occasion. {P.Burton. {OUTDOOR FACILITIES} include two full- sized and two 5-a-side pitches for football, a play park, tennis courts, a BMX cycle track and bowling green. {P.Bainbridge. {SCOUTS/GUIDES/RANGERS }-Held in School or Scout Hall. {BROWNIES-}held twice a week. About 20 Brownies attend each. Guides meet once. All three groups participate in coffee mornings, camp fires and hold events for own funds and charities.{J.Gilderoy. CUBS-}After paying our 20p subscription we form a circle for the Grand Howl, then "break the flag".We play games,do badge work, lower the flag then prayers.{ J.Boyne.
